# Instructions for LoginFormValidation
applyTo: '/cslogbook/frontend/src/components/LoginForm.jsx',
title: LoginFormValidation,
description:
    This file contains the LoginForm component, which is responsible for rendering the login form and handling user input.
    The component uses React hooks to manage state and validation.
    The validation logic ensures that the email and password fields are filled out correctly before submission.
    The component also includes error handling for invalid input.

Coding standards, domain knowledge, and preferences that AI should follow.
